languages.text: Kibellah can re-roll a single attack or a dodge or parry when hit by an attack. Warp or mental damage dealt to her is reduced by −50%. She suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}detachment{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah re-rolls failed attacks, dodge, or parry once. All incoming Warp and Mental damage is reduced by 50%. Each ally in a radius of 2 cells around Kibellah applies 1 stack of {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}Detachment{/g} to her.

Kibellah can make a single re-roll to attack or to dodge or parry an attack if hit. Warp or mental damage dealt to her is reduced by −50%. She suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}detachment{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius.

Kibellah can make a single re-roll to attack or to dodge or parry an attack if hit. Warp or mental damage dealt to her is reduced by −50%. She suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}detachment{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius.

Kibellah can reroll a single attack or a dodge or parry when hit by an attack. Warp or mental damage dealt to her is reduced by −50%. She suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}detachment{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius.

Kibellah can reroll a single attack or a dodge or parry when hit by an attack. Warp or mental damage dealt to her is reduced by −50%. She suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}detachment{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius.

languages.text: Kibellah puede volver a intentar un solo ataque o una esquiva o desvío al recibir un ataque. El daño de disformidad y mental que recibe se reduce un −50 %. Sufre +1 acumulación de {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}indiferencia{/g} por cada aliado en un radio de 2 casillas.
languages.original_text: Kibellah can re-roll a single attack or a dodge or parry when hit by an attack. Warp or mental damage dealt to her is reduced by −50%. She suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}detachment{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah puede volver a intentar un solo ataque o una esquiva o desvío al recibir un ataque. El daño de disformidad y mental que recibe se reduce un −50 %. Sufre +1 acumulación de {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}indiferencia{/g} por cada aliado en un radio de 2 casillas.

languages.text: キベラは攻撃を受けたとき、シングルアタック、回避、受け流しの再判定をできる。彼女が受ける<歪み>ダメージまたは精神的ダメージは−50%減少する。半径2セル内にいる味方1人につき、{g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}孤立{/g}を+1スタック得る。
languages.original_text: Kibellah can reroll a single attack or a dodge or parry when hit by an attack. Warp or mental damage dealt to her is reduced by −50%. She suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}detachment{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: キベラは攻撃を受けたとき、シングルアタック、回避、パリィの再判定をできる。彼女が受ける<歪み>ダメージまたは精神的ダメージは−50%減少する。半径2セル内にいる味方1人につき、{g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}孤立{/g}を+1スタック得る。

languages.text: 绮贝菈在进行单次攻击或遭受攻击时，可额外重骰一次。她受到的亚空间伤害与精神伤害降低50%。她周围2格内每有一名盟友，就会获得1层{g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}冷漠{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: Kibellah can re-roll a single attack or a dodge or parry when hit by an attack. Warp or mental damage dealt to her is reduced by −50%. She suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}detachment{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: 绮贝菈在进行单次攻击或遭受攻击时，可额外重骰一次。她受到的亚空间伤害与精神伤害降低50%。她周围2格内每有一名盟友，就会获得1层{g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}冷漠{/g}效果。

languages.text: Wird Kibellah von einem Angriff getroffen, kann sie einen Einzelangriff, ein Ausweichmanöver oder eine Parade erneut würfeln. Erlittener Warp- oder Mentalschaden wird um −50 % reduziert. Sie wird für jeden Verbündeten in einem Radius von 2 Zellen mit +1 Stapel {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}Trennung{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text: Kibellah can re-roll a single attack or a dodge or parry when hit by an attack. Warp or mental damage dealt to her is reduced by −50%. She suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}detachment{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Wird Kibellah von einem Angriff getroffen, kann sie einen Einzelangriff, ein Ausweichmanöver oder eine Parade erneut würfeln. Erlittener Warp- oder Mentalschaden wird um -50 % reduziert. Sie wird für jeden Verbündeten in einem Radius von 2 Zellen mit +1 Stapel {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}Trennung{/g} belegt.

languages.text: Lorsqu'elle subit une attaque, Kibellah peut relancer un jet de dés sur une attaque, une esquive ou une parade. Elle subit -50 % de dégâts Warp ou mentaux. Confère +1 d'{g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}Indifférence{/g} par allié présent dans un rayon de 2 cases.
languages.original_text: Kibellah can re-roll a single attack or a dodge or parry when hit by an attack. Warp or mental damage dealt to her is reduced by −50%. She suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}detachment{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'elle subit une attaque, Kibellah peut relancer un jet de dés sur une attaque, une esquive ou une parade. Elle subit -50 % de dégâts Warp ou mentaux. Confère +1 d'{g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}Indifférence{/g} par allié présent dans un rayon de 2 cases.

languages.text: Кибелла может один раз совершить повторный бросок при неудачной атаке, уклонении или парировании. Она получает на 50% меньше психического и варп-урона. Также она получает +1 уровень {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}отчуждения{/g} за каждого союзника в радиусе 2 клеток.
languages.original_text: Kibellah can reroll a single attack or a dodge or parry when hit by an attack. Warp or mental damage dealt to her is reduced by −50%. She suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}detachment{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Кибелла может один раз совершить повторный бросок при неудачной атаке, уклонении или парировании. Она получает на 50% меньше психического и варп-урона. Также она получает +1 уровень {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}отчуждения{/g} за каждого союзника в радиусе 2 клеток.

Кибелла может один раз совершить повторный бросок при неудачной атаке, уклонении или парировании. Она получает на 50% меньше психического и варп-урона. Также она получает +1 уровень {g|f:f823a8e976eb4a2caaf1ca375f173fe5}отчуждения{/g} за каждого союзника в радиусе 2 клеток.
